content.description: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is a serum product with listed benefits including Brightening, Fades dark spots, listed as suitable for Oily and Combination skin. It includes Vitamin C as a key ingredient, delivered at 10% Vitamin C concentration, and is described as supporting Brightening, Fades dark spots.
key_features: Suitable for oily and combination skin

ingredients.content: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum features Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid at 10% Vitamin C concentration.

benefits.content: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum delivers powerful benefits including Brightening and Fades dark spots.

usage.content: How to use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

safety.content: Safety information: Mild tingling for sensitive skin

skin_type.content: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is specially formulated for Oily and Combination skin types.

price.content: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is priced at ₹699.
